text: 5.8-10 2 Sml 6.9, 1 Kin 17.18, Mat 4.19 Anɨgek nɨŋɨd, Saymon Pita bɨne ayɨp bot mɨgan yelak okok, kɨli gos kuŋay yɨbɨl nɨgɨlak. Pen Sepedi ñɨne Jemis ayɨp, Jon ayɨp, bot olap dɨl Saymon ayɨp wog jɨmñɨl gelɨgɨpal bɨ omɨŋal ak, abe gos kuŋay nɨgɨlek. Pen Saymon Jisas yek sɨŋak apyap pakɨl agak, Bɨawl. Yad bɨ tap si tap tɨmel gɨpin ak, nad ke sɨŋak amnoŋ agak. Agek Jisas agak, Ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Mɨñɨl ñɨn awl tɨkɨl, bɨ kubsal dep ak kelɨgɨl, bɨ binɨb dɨl dad God yɨl owep ak yenɨgaban agak.
